stimulusHtml: Most scholars theorize that the Moai on platform (ahu) of Rapa Nui (Easter Island) were traditionally oriented to face inland, away from the ocean, for which of the following reasons?
choicesHtml: To underscore the Moai’s purpose as votive offerings to the gods associated with the island
To emphasize the Moai’s role as guardians over the community living on the island
To facilitate the transportation of the Moai and their positioning on the raised platforms (ahu)
To preserve the faces of the Moai from damage by the wind and saltwater spray
